statement:
If $A$ and $B$ are non-empty subsets of ${\ensuremath{{\mathbb{Z}}}}_p$,
then
$${\left\lvert A+B\right\rvert}\geq \min({\left\lvert A\right\rvert}+{\left\lvert B\right\rvert}-1, p),$$
where $A+B$ denotes the sumset of $A$ and $B$.

Melvyn B. Nathanson. , volume 165 of [*GTM*]{}. Springer, 1996. .
